title: Transfer
description: A resource flow that occurs as part of an event

transferClassifiedAs.description: a #TransferClassification describing the type of the transfer

inputs.description: The #EconomicEvent this transfer inputs from (needs links on inputOf)

outputs.description: The #EconomicEvent this transfer outputs to (needs links on outputOf)

additionalProperties.title: VfObject
additionalProperties.description: A base class for all VF objects with common properties

name.description: A simple name, a valid XML identifier, but not necessarily unique

url.description: A URL where additional information can be obtained

image.description: A URL that points to an image of the object
